FuncDef: The reset dhcpv6-server statistics command clears statistics about a specified DHCPv6 server.

ParaDef.Info:
IPv6 address of the DHCPv6 server.
The value is a 32-bit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be '_public_'. If spaces are used, the string must start and end with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset dhcpv6-server statistics command clear statistics about packets sent between the device (the relay agent) and a DHCPv6 server. Different types of packets are counted separately, including DHCP Solicit, Request, Information, Renew, Rebind, Release, and Relay-forward packets that are sent to or replied by the DHCPv6 server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
